ja374:7.3: Nayīdha naccagītaṃ vā → nayidha naccaṃ vā gītaṃ vā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja374:7.5: Anamhikāle → anamhakāle (pts-vp-pli1ed), susoṇi → sussoṇi (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja374:9.4: maññe tvaññeva → mampi tvaññeva (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed) | tvampi maññeva (pts-vp-pli1ed)
